## PPE - PERSONAL PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT (Rule 1080)

**Fall Protection (above 1.8m / 6ft):**
- Safety belt: 11.5 cm wide, 4.76 mm thick minimum
- Life line: 1.9 cm diameter minimum
- Manila rope: 2.5 cm minimum

**Hard Hat Classes:**
- Class A: General service, impact and penetration
- Class B: Electrical hazards up to 20,000 volts
- Class C: Comfort only, no electrical protection

**Respiratory Protection:**
- Dust mask: Nuisance dusts <TLV
- Half mask: Up to 10x TLV
- Full face: Up to 50x TLV
- SCBA: IDLH atmospheres

**Key Points:**
- Employer must provide PPE FREE of charge
- Training on proper use required
- PPE must meet standards
